snippet: Mission Brief is passing up the Hambetonian Oaks to try to become the first filly since 1996 to win Saturday’s main event, the most prestigious race for trotters.
abstract: Record-setting harness racing filly Mission Brief passes up Hambletonian Oaks, undercard harness race she would have been odds-on favorite to win, to try to become first filly since 1996 to win Hambletonian, most prestigious race for trotters.
lead_paragraph: Mission Brief is passing up the Hambetonian Oaks to try to become the first filly since 1996 to win Saturday’s main event, the most prestigious race for trotters.

headline.main: Headstrong Filly Will Skip Undercard and Take on Colts in Hambletonian
headline.print_headline: Headstrong Filly Will Skip Undercard and Take On Colts in Hambletonian
